Title: CS595J--Readings in Multimedia, Digital Audio, and Computer Music
Body: Topics: 1: Introduction: digital audio signal processing and computer music 2: Basic digital audio signals and transformations 3: Software sound synthesis and "sound compilers" 4: Spatial processing of sound 5: Representation of musical signals and data 6: Sound compression, transmission and storage formats 7: MIDI and real-time control processing 8: Music composition using computers 9: Practical software for multimedia computing 10: The "Real-world"--Conclusions
